text: The Kashtabhanjan Dev Temple is a Hindu temple located in Sarangpur, Gujarat, India. It is dedicated to Lord Hanuman, a revered deity in Hinduism. The temple has become a significant pilgrimage site for devotees seeking blessings and relief from their troubles. The shrine of Lord Hanuman is a central focus of the temple's design. == Worship and beliefs == Devotees visit the Kashtabhanjan Dev Temple to seek solace and relief from their hardships. The temple is believed to possess divine powers to alleviate the burdens of its visitors. == Festivals == The temple celebrates various festivals Category:Hindu temples Category:Temples in India Category:Gujarat
title: Kashtbhanjan Dev Sarangpur
